1.0.name: wordpress/font-controller
1.0.description: Font-Controller allows you to place a font-controller inside your blog, it has three options, increase, decrease and reset. You can add the tags into your template, post ect. By default it places the widget into the footer and the sidebar It is based on the Font-Controller jQuery plugin.
